sentence: The girl watched the boy with the telescope
interpretations: The girl had a telescope
The boy had a telescope

sentence: She values reading books more than her brother
interpretations: She values reading books more than she values her brother
She values reading books more than her brother values reading books

sentence: She values helping her mother more than her father
interpretations: She values helping her mother more than her father values helping her mother
She values helping her mother more than she values helping her father

sentence: The teacher likes helping students more than the principal
interpretations: The teacher prefers helping students more than the principal prefers helping students
The teacher prefers helping students more than helping the principal

sentence: The teacher likes helping students more than cleaning the whiteboard
interpretations: The teacher prefers helping students to cleaning the whiteboard
The teacher likes helping students more than the whiteboard-cleaning activity does

sentence: We enjoy meeting clients more than our competitors
interpretations: We enjoy meeting clients more than we enjoy meeting our competitors
We enjoy meeting clients more than our competitors

sentence: The old women and men gathered in the hall
interpretations: Old women and men gathered
Old women and men (not necessarily old) gathered

sentence: The chicken is ready to eat
interpretations: The chicken is prepared/cooked and ready to be eaten
The chicken (as an animal) is ready to consume food

sentence: The dog is ready to eat
interpretations: The dog is prepared/cooked and ready to be eaten
The dog (as an animal) is ready to consume food

sentence: The revolution is before us
interpretations: The revolution is in our future
The revolution is physically in front of us
The revolution is our responsibility

sentence: The meeting originally scheduled for next Wednesday has been moved forward two days
interpretations: The meeting is now next Monday
The meeting is now next Friday

sentence: When the police stopped the drivers, they were drunk
interpretations: The drivers were drunk
The police were drunk

sentence: Sarah told Emily that she got the promotion
interpretations: Sarah got the promotion
Emily got the promotion

sentence: I like visiting relatives more than my sister
interpretations: I like visiting relatives more than my sister likes visiting relatives
I like visiting relatives more than I like visiting my sister

sentence: He's more afraid of spiders than his wife
interpretations: He is more afraid of spiders than his wife is
He is more afraid of spiders than he is afraid of his wife

sentence: I saw her duck
interpretations: I saw her lower her head
I saw a duck that belongs to her

sentence: The project deadline was pushed ahead by one week
interpretations: The deadline was made earlier
The deadline was delayed

sentence: The flight departure was set back three hours
interpretations: The departure was delayed three hours
The departure was moved to an earlier time

sentence: The love of God is powerful
interpretations: God's love is powerful
People's love for God is powerful

sentence: The photographing of celebrities has become invasive
interpretations: People photographing celebrities has become invasive
Celebrities photographing others has become invasive

sentence: Chocolate cakes and cookies were served
interpretations: Chocolate cakes and chocolate cookies were served (both are chocolate)
Chocolate cakes and cookies (of any flavor) were served

sentence: Red velvet cake and cookies were served
interpretations: Red velvet cakes and red velvet cookies were served (both are red velvet)
Red velvet cakes and cookies (of any flavor) were served

sentence: Entertaining guests can be exhausting
interpretations: The act of entertaining guests can be exhausting
Guests who are entertaining can be exhausting

sentence: We moved the party up from Saturday
interpretations: The party is now earlier
The party now later

sentence: I respect my mentor more than my colleague
interpretations: I respect my mentor more than I respect my colleague
I respect my mentor more than my colleague respects my mentor

sentence: Call me a taxi
interpretations: Summon a taxi for me
Refer to me as a taxi

sentence: Call me a bad driver
interpretations: Phone/summon a bad driver for me
Refer to me as a bad driver

sentence: Flying planes can be dangerous
interpretations: Piloting planes is dangerous
Planes that are flying can be dangerous

sentence: He fed her cat food
interpretations: He fed food to her cat
He fed her (a person) some cat food

sentence: The peasants are revolting
interpretations: The peasants are staging a revolt
The peasants are disgusting

sentence: Look at the dog with one eye
interpretations: Look at the dog using one of your eyes
Look at the dog that has only one eye

sentence: I am glad I am a man, and so is Dakota
interpretations: Dakota is also glad that I am a man
Dakota is also a man

sentence: The criticism of the professor was harsh
interpretations: Criticism directed at the professor was harsh
The professor's criticism of others was harsh

sentence: Students who study rarely get bad grades
interpretations: Students who rarely study get bad grades
Students who study get bad grades rarely

sentence: She decided on the boat
interpretations: She made her decision while on the boat
She chose the boat

sentence: We saw the Eiffel Tower flying to Paris
interpretations: We saw the Eiffel Tower while we were flying to Paris
We saw the Eiffel Tower that was flying to Paris

sentence: They are hunting dogs
interpretations: They are dogs used for hunting
They are hunting for dogs

sentence: They are hunting deer
interpretations: They are deer used for hunting
They are hunting for deer

sentence: I saw the man with the binoculars
interpretations: I used binoculars to see the man
I saw the man who had binoculars

sentence: The Mayor says the police must stop drinking
interpretations: The police must stop consuming alcohol
The police must prevent others from drinking

sentence: He didn't leave because he was angry
interpretations: He left but not because he was angry
He didn't leave; the reason is that he was angry

sentence: Two students read every book
interpretations: Two specific students read all the books
For every book, there are two students who read it

sentence: The shooting of the hunters was terrible
interpretations: Someone shooting the hunters was terrible
The hunters doing the shooting was terrible

sentence: The shooting of the deer was terrible
interpretations: Someone shooting the deer was terrible
The deer doing the shooting was terrible

sentence: John and Mary got married
interpretations: John and Mary married each other
They each married someone (but not each other)

sentence: Katelyn and Diana got married
interpretations: Katelyn and Diana married each other
They each married someone (but not each other)

sentence: All the students didn't pass the exam
interpretations: Not all students passed (some failed)
All students failed the exam

sentence: I didn't go to the store because I was tired
interpretations: I went to the store but tiredness wasn't the reason
I stayed home because I was tired

sentence: She didn't call him back because she was busy
interpretations: She called him back but not due to being busy
She didn't call him back; being busy was the reason

sentence: A doctor examined every patient
interpretations: One doctor examined all patients
For each patient, some doctor (possibly different) examined them

sentence: The discovery of the scientists changed everything
interpretations: What the scientists discovered changed everything
Someone's discovery of the scientists changed everything

sentence: The painting of the artist is valuable
interpretations: The painting done by the artist is valuable
The painting depicting the artist is valuable

sentence: A stolen painting was found by a tree
interpretations: A stolen painting was found near a tree
A tree found a stolen painting

sentence: A stolen painting was found by a man
interpretations: A stolen painting was found near a man
A man found a stolen painting

sentence: The shooting of the elk was dreadful
interpretations: Someone shooting the elk was dreadful
The elk doing the shooting was dreadful

sentence: The discovery of the astronomers changed something
interpretations: What the astronomers discovered changed something
Someone's discovery of the astronomers changed something

sentence: James and Will got divorced
interpretations: James and Will divorced each other
They each divorced someone (but not each other)

sentence: Hannah and Jason got divorced
interpretations: Hannah and Jason divorced each other
They each divorced someone (but not each other)

sentence: She saw John flying to Paris
interpretations: She saw John while she was flying to Paris
She saw John while he was flying to Paris

sentence: He's been working since 12
interpretations: He has been working since the age of 12
He has been working since 12:00

sentence: She visited twice in January
interpretations: She made two visits in January
She visited on two separate Januarys

sentence: Stacy watched Joanna leave with tears in her eyes
interpretations: Stacy had tears in her eyes while watching Joanna leave
Stacy watched Joanna leave with tears in her eyes

sentence: Visiting professors can be interesting
interpretations: Professors who are visiting can be interesting
The act of visiting professors can be interesting

sentence: They fed her dog biscuits
interpretations: They give biscuits to her dog
They gave her (a person) dog biscuits

sentence: I watched the race with my father
interpretations: I observed the race while being with my father
I observed the race that involved my father

sentence: The prosecution of the lawyers was controversial
interpretations: Lawyers prosecuting cases was controversial
Someone prosecuting the lawyers was controversial

sentence: The bill was passed by the house
interpretations: The bill was passed by the House (legislative body)
The bill was handed/passed near a house (building)

sentence: Organic fruits and vegetables were sold
interpretations: Organic vegetables and organic fruits were sold
Organic vegetables and fruits (of any type) were sold

sentence: Blue shirts and pants were donated
interpretations: Blue shirts and blue pants were donated
Blue shirts and pants (of any color) were donated

sentence: I like baking bread more than cakes
interpretations: I like breaking bread more than I like baking cakes
I like baking bread more than I like cakes (not baking them)

sentence: Ten volunteers helped every family
interpretations: Ten specific volunteers helped all families
For each family, ten volunteers (possibly different) helped them

sentence: The recording of the musicians was excellent
interpretations: What the musicians recorded was excellent
Someone recording the musicians was excellent

sentence: They didn't cancel because it was sunny
interpretations: They cancelled but the sun wasn't the reason
They didn't cancel; the sun was the reason

sentence: He has been running since 5
interpretations: He has been running since 5:00 (time)
He has been running since the age of 5

sentence: He has been teaching since 8
interpretations: He has been teaching since 8:00 (time)
He has been teaching since the age of 8

sentence: She can't bear children
interpretations: She can't tolerate children
She can't give birth to children

sentence: The neighbors quarreled over the fence
interpretations: The neighbors quarreled with each other on opposite sides of the fence
The neighbors quarreled with each other about the fence

sentence: Maria painted the woman on the balcony
interpretations: Maria painted a picture of the woman who was on the balcony
Maria was on the balcony when she painted the woman

sentence: The man hit the thief with the cane
interpretations: The man used a cane to hit the thief
The thief had a cane

sentence: The woman hit the man with the newspaper
interpretations: The woman used a newspaper to hit the man
The man had a newspaper

sentence: The man shot the model on the beach
interpretations: The model was shot (violence) on the beach
The model was photographed on the beach

sentence: Someone cleaned the table with the rag
interpretations: The rag was used for cleaning the table
The table came with a rag on it

sentence: The girl chased the boy on the bike
interpretations: The girl was on the bike
The boy was on the bike

sentence: The dog followed the man with the flashlight
interpretations: The dog had a flashlight
The man had a flashlight

sentence: The doctor examined the patient with gloves
interpretations: The doctor had gloves
The patient had gloves

sentence: The cat chased the mouse in the kitchen
interpretations: The chasing occurred in the kitchen
The mouse was in the kitchen

sentence: The student wrote the essay on the computer
interpretations: The student used the computer
The essay was about a computer

sentence: The horse followed the rider with the rope
interpretations: The rider had a rope
The horse had a rope

sentence: The boy kicked the ball near the school
interpretations: The kicking happened near the school
The ball was near the school

sentence: Everyone didn't attend the meeting
interpretations: Not everyone attended (some were absent)
Everyone was absent from the meeting
